metadataAttributes.Title: Patient Safety and Quality Improvement: Developing a Systems View (Patient Safety I)
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: In this course, you will be able develop a systems view for patient safety and quality improvement in healthcare.  By then end of this course, you will be able to: 1) Describe a minimum of four key events in the history of patient safety and quality improvement, 2) define the key characteristics of high reliability organizations, and 3) explain the benefits of having strategies for both proactive and reactive systems thinking.
